title: Lyndon Queen Bed
description:
The Lyndon collection allows you to create a rustic master room. The horizontal line design throughout the collection will bring you a relaxing but not monotonous environment with entire weathered gray grain finish in your bedroom. It has plentiful space to store your folded clothing in dresser and chest. English dovetail drawers construction and center metal glide make you more convenient to open and close the drawers.

title: Leonora California King Bed
description:
The Leonora bedroom collection brings opulence into your home, with elegant details such as raised scrolled-floral molding and cabriole legs. At the center of this collection is a padded bed, with winged, arched headboard and footboard, both bedecked with button tufting. Case pieces with bowed silhouettes emphasize Leonora's classic design.

title: Antares Queen Bed
description:
If you are looking for nobility with a touch of modern sophistication, the Antares bedroom collection has it. From the upholstered headboard with beveled mirror trim accented by led lighting to the light oak finished wood construction, this set is magnificent in all details. It is beautifully complemented by matching case goods with wooden block legs, felt-lined top drawers, and English dovetail throughout as well as crystal acrylic knobs. The Antares collection allows the right level of splendor without pretentiousness.
